info.title: Cars Management API
info.description:
## Introduction

This project is a implementation of a Car Management API in [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/). It uses [Express](https://expressjs.com/) as web framework and [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/) as database.

This application allows new users to register and authenticate using the JSON web token. Registered member can view the list of available cars . Admin has additional privileges such as adding new cars to databases or other actions to manage cars & users.

post.description: This endpoint is to make a record of arrival by signing, enter a email and password in order to gain access to a API resources
This endpoint used to create a new member registration for an existing user. you must specify your data and it will be sent from the request body.

delete.description: This endpoint used to signs the user out by remove user token cridential

tags.name: Auth

tags.description: User endpoints is used to manage available users, such as adding, updating, and several other actions. Some resources can only be accessed by the admin & super admin.
